comments:
Whenever I'm running a debug session I get a popup stating an Internal Error occurred and the message states "Model Proxy Insalled notification job".  If I have no breakpoints set and the application does not have any errors, it will run to completion.  However, when I set a breakpoint and it is hit, the application stalls, the breakpoint is not accessible (step, continue and other debug functions are disabled as if the breakpoint was not reached).  

The message from log file is 
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-03-05 11:55:36.275
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Model Proxy installed notification job".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/eclipse/debug/internal/ui/viewers/update/StackFrameEventHandler
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.threadgroups.JavaDebugTargetProxy.createEventHandlers(JavaDebugTargetProxy.java:38)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.viewers.update.EventHandlerModelProxy.init(EventHandlerModelProxy.java:109)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.viewers.AsynchronousModel$1.run(AsynchronousModel.java:191)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
Please try a clean installation. This class was added in 3.2.1. Works for me.
